name: UploadGlAccounts
description:
Upload a batch of general ledger accounts to Ramp.

Use this tool to upload up to 500 general ledger accounts in a single batch to Ramp. Ensure data is sanitized and accounts do not already exist on Ramp. If any account is invalid, the entire batch is rejected.

parameters.name: gl_account_list
parameters.description: JSON array of up to 500 general ledger accounts. Each account should include fields for classification, code, id, and name.

id.description: Remote/external ID of GL account in ERP system.

gl_accounts.description: A list of general ledger accounts that you want to use to classify your Ramp transactions.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the ramp API.

id.description: Remote/external ID of GL account in ERP system.

gl_accounts.description: A list of general ledger accounts that you want to use to classify your Ramp transactions.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
